author: ben_a_adams
content:
Idea, what do you think of CLZ for fusaka?

https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-7939

CLZ isn't CFI'd but if we want to send signal we are listening to dev community, would be a good one? (Is fairly a simple OPCODE)

author: robocopsgonemad
content: can anyone remind me why we didn't introduce a new transaction type for PeerDAS? I'm considering treating it like an 'alias' for a new type, internal only to besu, because it'll fit into existing code much easier; that code is not aware of the protocol schedule. however, if we had a good reason for treating these as the same type... i can't remember it

author: lightclient
content: it's because the consensus object isn't changing, only the network wrapper
